message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_SET
message.locale: No rule set with name '%1s' could be found.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_WRONG_CLASS
message.locale: Expected an instance of the rule class '%1s', but the rule object supplied ('%2s') is an instance of rule class '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROGRAMS_SUPPLIED
message.locale: No programs have been supplied.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION
message.locale: Simulated determination '%1n' could not be found for program recommendation.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_OBJECT_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDER
message.locale: No rule object of rule class '%1s' found for case '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_MRE_RULE_OBJECT_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDER
message.locale: More than one rule object of rule class '%1s' found for case '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: No rule attribute with name '%1s' could be found on rule class '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION_AUTHORIZED
message.locale: Simulated determination '%1n' for program recommendation '%2n' has been authorized.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION_DECLINED
message.locale: Simulated determination '%1n' for program recommendation '%2n' has been declined.

message.name: ERR_FV_CREOLE_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_DATA_MANDATORY
message.locale: CREOLE Program Recommendation data must be provided for this CREOLE program recommendation.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A case must be provided for this CREOLE program recommendation.

message.name: ERR_FV_CREOLE_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_SNAPSHOT_NULL
message.locale: CREOLE program recommendation snapshot cannot be null.

message.name: ERR_FV_AUTHORIZATION_CREOLE_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A CREOLE Program Recommendation must be provided for this authorization.

message.name: ERR_FV_AUTHORIZATION_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Simulated Determination must be provided for this authorization.

message.name: ERR_FV_AUTHORIZATION_CASE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A case must be provided for this authorization.

message.name: ERR_FV_DECLINATION_CREOLE_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A CREOLE Program Recommendation must be provided for this declination.

message.name: ERR_FV_DECLINATION_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Simulated Determination must be provided for this declination.

message.name: ERR_FV_EVIDENCE_USED_MANDATORY
message.locale: The type of evidence used must be provided for this CREOLE Program Recommendation.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_CREOLE_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_COMPARISON_STRATEGY
message.locale: No registered strategy implementation found for CREOLE Program Recommendation comparison strategy type '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECT_PERSONS_EXIST_ON_APPLICATION
message.locale: All clients must be registered. Please register all prospect persons on this application.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUMMARY_PRODUCT_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Creole Program Recommendation product must be provided for this CREOLE program recommendation summary.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUMMARY_ELIGIBILE_STATUS_MANDATORY
message.locale: An Eligible status must be provided for this CREOLE program recommendation summary.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUMMARY_CREOLE_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: A CREOLE Program Recommendation must be provided for this CREOLE program recommendation result.

message.name: ERR_FV_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_RESULT_DATA_MANDATORY
message.locale: Program Recommendation data must be provided for this CREOLE program recommendation.
